summary:
*CAUTION, THIS IS A JOKE MOD*

Simple little replacer for Lydia\'s nose, eyes, and hair. Hopefully she looks a little somewhat like Voldemort. :D
descriptionHtml:
*CAUTION, THIS IS A JOKE MOD*

Simple little replacer for Lydia\'s nose, eyes, and hair. Hopefully she looks a little somewhat like Voldemort. :D

Pictures taken with my ENB, found here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40456/?]Sublte ENB by Bill[/url]

Mods used in pictures:
Eyes of Beauty
No More Blocky Faces
Dual Sheath Redux
Dynavision

If you like this mod, please endorse!

Check out my other mods: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4831711/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Mods[/url]

Thanks for your time, enjoy!
author: billmineface
